text: Ramsdenia is a genus of land snails with an operculum, terrestrial gastropod mollusks in the family Pomatiidae."Mollusca" . Diversidad Biológica Cubana, accessed 23 March 2011. == Species == Species within the genus Ramsdenia include: * Ramsdenia bufo (Pfeiffer, 1864) * Ramsdenia natensoni (Torre & Bartsch, 1941) * Ramsdenia nobilitata (Gundlach in Poey, 1858) * Ramsdenia perspectiva (Gundlach in Pfeiffer, 1859) == References == Category:Pomatiidae
title: Ramsdenia
